# delegate

**Instance Property**

An object to be notified when Live Photo playback begins or ends.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any PHLivePhotoViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Responding to Playback Events

- **PHLivePhotoViewDelegate**: The [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoViewDelegate] protocol describes messages sent by a [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView] instance in response to playback events when playing the motion and sound content associated with a Live Photo. To receive these messages, implement the methods in this protocol in one of your controller objects and assign that object to the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/delegate] property of a Live Photo view.
